src:
Vlada Lučić: Slobodin cilj je opstanak u KLS-u i afirmacija mladih igrača
Trener Užičana smatra da je Borac najozbiljniji kanditat za šampiona KLS i ABA 2 lige

05 Nov 2019

Nakon pet kola Košarkaške lige Srbije možemo konstatovati da je čačanski Borac jedini bez poraza u najvišem rangu srpske lige. Novi Pazar, OKK Beograd, Zlatibor i Vršac imaju po jedan neuspeh. Iza pomenutih klubova je užička Sloboda sa skorom 3:2. Užičani su na štitu završili gostovanje u Čajetini, sa večitim rivalom Zlatiborom, a sad ih očekuje još jedan neugodan rival, tim Napretka.
Čačanin na klupi Slobode trener Vladimir Lučić zadovoljan je dosadašnjim učinkom svojih izabranika.“Doživeli smo dva poraza, ali na vrućim terenima u Čačku i Čajetini. U dvorani kraj Morave bili smo ravnopravan rival Borcu. Možda smo mogli da pobedimo, ali nismo, kao ni u Čajetini. Idemo dalje jer nas očekuje ozbiljan rival Napredak iz Aleksinca. Imamo par povređenih igrača i videćemo kako će ići njihov oporavak”, ističe Lučić.
Sloboda ima veoma mlad sastav.“Veoma sam zadovoljan ekipom. Mlad i talentovan tim koji voli da radi, ali će biti puno oscilacija tokom sezone. Međutim, očekujem da napredujemo kako prvenstvo bude odmicalo. Naš cilj je da mladi igrači dobiju šansu, da se spreme za ozbiljne seniorske sezone, a da Sloboda izbori opstanak u KLS-u. O Superligi možda možemo tokom sezone da razmišljamo”.
Užičani budućnost vide u mladim snagama.“Tako je. Tu su Tadić, Nikolić, Đorđević, Ćubić…Oni će činiti okosnicu Slobodine ekipe u budućnosti. Užičani su uz nas, prepoznali su našu mladost koja obećava i daju nam vetar u leđa”.
Nakon pet kola šta se može reći o KLS – u, ali i ostalim ligama poput ABA 2?“Po organizaciji i kvalitetu izdvojili su se Borac, Zlatibor, Pazar, Dinamik… Apsolutni favorit je Borac, a Sloboda je pokazala da može da se nosi sa Čačanima i Zlatiborcima. Mi moramo da pobeđujemo ekipe koji se bore za sredinu tabele. ABA 2 je slabija nego minulih sezona. Prošle godine Primorska je pokazala ozbiljne namere, igrački kadar, budžet je bio na višem nivou. Evo i sad su sjajno startovali u ABA ligi. Glavni kandidati za plasman na Jadran su Borac, MZT, Sutjeska, možda i Široki. U ABA 1 Primorska, FMP pokazuju puno, pravo su osveženje uz Partizan, Zvezdu… Budućnost je u drugom planu. I da kažem za Evroligu, izuzetno kvalitetni timovi, dobre utakmice. Željko i Fener će ući u formu, kao i obično, kad je najpotrebnije. Barsa je najkvalitetnija, Milano je odličan, Real, Žalgiris…Gledamo odličnu elitnu košarku”, konstatovao je Lučić.
PIŠE: Đurđe MEČANINFOTO: PrintscreenDjurdje.mecanin@mozzartbet.com

text:
Vlada Lucic: Slobod's goal is to survive in KLS and to promote young players
Užican's coach considers Borac the most serious candidate for KLS and ABA 2 league champions

05 Nov 2019

After five rounds of the Serbian Basketball League, we can conclude that Čačak Borac is the only one without defeat in the highest rank of the Serbian league. Novi Pazar, OKK Belgrade, Zlatibor and Vrsac have one failure each. Behind the mentioned clubs is Uzice Freedom with a score of 3: 2. The wizards ended their visit to Čajetina with their eternal rival Zlatibor on the shield, and now they have another nasty rival, the Napredak team.
Čačanin on the Freedom bench, coach Vladimir Lucic is pleased with the performance of his chosen players so far. "We have experienced two defeats, but on hot terrains in Čačak and Čajetina. In the hall near Morava we were an equal rival to the Fighter. We may have been able to win, but we did not, as in Cajetina. Let's move on because a serious rival Napredak from Aleksinac awaits us. We have a couple of injured players and we will see how their recovery will go, ”Lucic points out.
Freedom has a very young squad. ”I am very pleased with the team. A young and talented team that loves to work but will be full of fluctuations throughout the season. However, I expect that we will make progress as the championship progresses. Our goal is for young players to get a chance, to prepare for serious senior seasons, and for Freedom to survive in KLS. Maybe we can think about the Super League during the season. "
They see the wired future in young forces. "That's right. There are Tadic, Nikolic, Djordjevic, Cubic ... They will form the backbone of the Free Team in the future. They are close to us, they recognize our promising youth and give us a wind in the back. "
After five rounds, what can be said about KLS, as well as other leagues like ABA 2? ”By organization and quality, Borac, Zlatibor, Pazar, Dynamic stand out… An absolute favorite is Borac, and Freedom has shown that it can handle with Čačani and Zlatiborci. We need to beat the teams that fight for the middle of the table. ABA 2 is weaker than last season. Last year, Primorska showed serious intentions, the game staff, the budget was at a higher level. Here and now they have a great start in the ABA league. The main candidates for placement on the Adriatic are Borac, MZT, Sutjeska, and perhaps Siroki. In ABA 1 Primorska, FMP show a lot, they are a real refreshment with Partizan, Zvezda… The future is in the background. And to say for the Euroleague, extremely good teams, good games. Zeljko and Fener will get in shape, as usual, when needed most. Barça is the highest quality, Milan is excellent, Real, Zalgiris ... We look at excellent elite basketball, ”Lucic noted.
WRITING: Djurdje MECHANINPhoto: PrintscreenDjurdje.mecanin@mozzartbet.com
